website_summaries.verdict: The Pixma iP6310D has the print quality and the features that make it an attractive photo printer, but for just a bit more money, you can get an all-in-one printer from Canon that has better quality and faster speeds.

customer_reviews.title: printer
customer_reviews.text: So far I am pleased with this product. It arrived undamaged and much faster than I had anticipated. For an inkjet printer the quality is really good, though somewhat slow. It is easy to use and install. I have had some trouble with printing as the paper in the tray was not feeding properly. After working with it for a while I finally got it to work. I have not used it to print photos yet, but so far I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hargrett

customer_reviews.title: Printer was broken when opened
customer_reviews.text: Printer was not working and had several broken belts and cracked housing when opened.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a pain in the a**. The cartridges don't last, the color cartridges have lasted for about 1 picture and it will print with 1/2 color and 1/2 black and white. I've also had problems with the Canon scanner. I just bought an HP and it has been a dream compared to this.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Weathers

customer_reviews.title: Used printer
customer_reviews.text: Printer did not meet my needs as a good printer as stated in the reviews. Price was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos G.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with any Mac higher than OS 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with any Mac higher than OS 10.7. Card reader does not read SD cards. Unit is obsolete.
customer_reviews.author: Quickemart

customer_reviews.title: Canon iP6310
customer_reviews.text: Good printer for most home applicatios.Good value compared to spending as much for replacement parts for older printer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koper

customer_reviews.title: Cheesy
customer_reviews.text: Definately got what I paid for - not much. Parts are loose and cheesy. Spend a little more and get something that will last. I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: Baysmom04

customer_reviews.title: perfect printer
customer_reviews.text: The product was recieved in record time. We really like the printer as it has all the features we need and it is user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Brouillard

customer_reviews.title: It's working for me.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple, inexpensive printer to print out my personal photo's. When factoring in the 2 included inkjet cartridges, this printer is just about free. The photo's it's printed for me look fine to my non-professional eyes. So far, I'm very happy with this printer as opposed to the utter frustration I experienced very quickly with my prior HP all-in-one. I had received the HP for free when I'd purchased my Macbook, and I had nothing but problems. However, this Canon has so far not given me a single problem, and the cost of replacement cartridges seems very reasonable. I recommend this printer for anybody needing a simple photo printer for low volume use.
customer_reviews.author: Musishin

customer_reviews.title: iP6310D at End of Life
customer_reviews.text: Currently, my printer reports an error that "The ink absorber is almost full". Canon tells me that the printer "is at end-of-life" and that maintenance and parts are no longer available. It was a good printer, but I am told that once the ink absorber is completely full, it will stop working altogether. Canon told me that the nearest repair center is what amounts to over an hour away. For my next printer, I will try to find a company which has a better maintenance policy.
customer_reviews.author: lantern

customer_reviews.title: Worst print!
customer_reviews.text: Worst printer design ever. This is the first printer I want to smash to a million pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kingdom Soul Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Canon PIXMA IP6310D
customer_reviews.text: for a photo printer, this isn't the greatest printer. I can't tell the differance in the pictures my epson C84 printed to what this one prints. however this printer is much faster. another thing, it only has 2 ink cartrages. if you are looking for a good photo printer get one that has 4 or more cartrages. all in all it is a good printer, but I don't think its worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Brown

customer_reviews.title: No Windows 8 drivers!
customer_reviews.text: Great little printer, sold a number of 8x10's with just this printer and Adobe Elements, however if you are running Windows 8, Canon says no drivers available for Win 8 or 8.1 64 bit!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Licht

product_meta.title: Canon PIXMA iP6310D Photo Inkjet Printer (Gray)
product_meta.description:
Want to print great photos, yet keep things simple? This is the perfect machine. Its patented print head technology and six ink colors produce beautiful, long-lasting photos with vivid color and detail. Plus, you can print photos directly from compatible memory cards and digital cameras - with automatic adjustments for face brightening and red-eye, as needed -- and even from Bluetooth devices using our optional adapter.

AMAZON.COM
Amazon.com Product Description The Canon PIXMA iP6310D Photo Inkjet Printer is an extremely user friendly, efficient printer designed to meet all your photo printing needs in one compact, stylish unit. This printer lets you print photos directly from compatible memory cards and digital cameras -- with automatic adjustments for face brightening and red-eye -- and even from Bluetooth devices using the optional adapter. 



The PIXMA iP6310D Photo Inkjet Printer is an extremely user-friendly, efficient printer designed to meet all your printing needs in one compact, stylish unit. View larger. 

This printer makes it easy to print and share digital photos at home. 

Whatever your needs, the single function iP6310D gives you more choices, more features and a better value. In addition, this printer features a unique cutting edge design that is very much in line with today's tastes and styles. It also fits comfortably on a desktop and adds a sleek and stylish element to any decor. There's no need to waste time and money finding somewhere to print your photos. With the iP6310D you can immediately print and enjoy images in the comfort of your own home. Convenience and Versatility
The iP6310D is a six-color photo printer that features Canon's ChromaLife100 ink system. Convenient and versatile, the iP31D supports a number of direct photo printing capabilities including select memory cards, digital cameras, DV camcorders, camera phones and other PictBridge ready devices. It also offers a maximum of 4800 by 1200 dots per inch (dpi) resolution with microscopic ink droplets as small as two picoliters. In fact, it can create a borderless 4 x 6 inch photo lab quality print in approximately a minute, as well as other popular sizes, from wallet to 8.5 x 11 inch size prints. The iP6310D also delivers fast print speeds of up to 60 seconds for 4 x 6 borderless photos and less than two minutes for 8 x 10 inch photos.

 ChromaLife100 Technology For Image Permanence
The iP6310D uses Canon's ChromaLife100 system, including FINE print head technology for great photo printing. When using select genuine Canon photo papers and inks, prints can resist fading for up to 100 years when stored in an archival quality photo album. The 100-year-lifespan rivals that of many traditional film based photos, long considered by consumers to be the benchmark for image permanence. Prints produced on Canon Photo Paper Pro with ChromaLife100 inks also have an up to 10-year gas fastness when exposed to open air. In addition, ChromaLife100 prints, when created using Canon Photo Paper Pro or Photo Paper Plus Glossy, have up to a 30-year light fastness when displayed under glass.

 Launched globally by Canon in 1999, the Canon Full-photolithography Inkjet Nozzle Engineering (FINE) advanced print head technology is one of the keys to the impressive speed and high photo quality in the iP6310D. FINE technology uses a ground-breaking high-performance, multi-nozzle print engine that ejects consistent and microscopic ink droplets. The results are high-resolution photos with great detail and clarity in less time. The iP6310D is the ideal printer when you want to print great photos, but still keep things simple.

 The iP6310D comes with a one-year limited warranty.

 
What's in the Box
Pixma iP6310D photo printer, cartridges (CL-41 color, CL-52 photo), power cord, easy setup instructions, document kit (setup instructions and user's guide CD-ROM, quick start guide, registration card, and cross sell sheet).
feature_bullets: Offers borderless printing in a variety of sizes including wallet, 4 x 6 inches, and 8.5 x 11 inches
Utilizes Canon's ChromaLife100 system, including FINE print head technology, for vivid, long-lasting prints
Offers a maximum of 4800 by 1200 dots per inch (dpi) resolution with microscopic ink droplets as small as two picoliters
Dimensions: 17.3 x 6.8 x 10.3 inches (WxHxD); weighs 7.5 pounds
Photo printer delivers 4 x 6 inch borderless photos in as fast as 60 seconds
